page_analysis.text_content:
Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

Fig 41 Examples of site planning solutions for detached 2nd dwelling units and associated required parking

A Detached & separate from main-
dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has a 1-car attached
garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car detached
garage. (Because it is detached and at
least 75' from the front lot line, it may be
located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use driveway for their
uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

B Attached & separate from main-
dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car attached
garage. (Because attached, it must be
located with the building area rather than
in the rear or side yards).
• Both dwellings use driveway for their
uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

C Detached & combined with
main-dwelling parking
• Both dwellings share a 2-car detached
garage. (Because it is detached and at
least 75' from the front lot line, it may be
located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their
respective uncovered spaces (beyond
front setback)
Interior lot example

D Combined w/ main-dwelling
parking that is attached to main
dwelling
• Both dwellings share a 2-car attached
garage.
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their
respective uncovered spaces (beyond
front setback)
Interior lot example

visual_elements.description: Four site plans (A, B, C, D) illustrating different parking solutions for detached 2nd dwelling units. Each plan shows a lot with a main dwelling, a detached 2nd dwelling unit, parking spaces (attached or detached garages, and uncovered spaces), and various setback lines. Cars are depicted in parking spaces. The plans include labels for 'Rear yard', 'Front yard', 'Interior-side yard', 'Main dwelling', 'Detached 2nd dwelling unit', 'Buildable area', and specific garage types.
visual_elements.location: Middle to bottom of the page

visual_elements.description: A legend explaining the symbols and shaded areas used in the site plans. It defines 'Curb', 'Lot line', 'Sidewalk', 'Required setbacks', 'Buildable area', 'Dwelling', '2nd-dwelling unit & associated pkg', 'Area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces', and 'Uncovered space'.

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum distance from front lot line for detached garage (A & C)
Minimum separation between main dwelling and 2nd dwelling unit

structural_elements.main_heading: Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning
subheadings: A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking
B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking
C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking
D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling

additional_notes: Page number '45' is present in the bottom right corner.
The text 'ming' appears truncated in the OCR for sections A and C, likely due to image quality or font style.

The text '200 sf max' appears under '1-car at-tached' in diagram B, which seems to be an OCR error as the main text for 'Detached 2nd dwelling unit' consistently states '900 sf max'. This '200 sf max' is not present in the original image.
The text '3' appears next to a diagonal line in diagrams A and C, likely indicating a dimension or slope, but the unit is missing and the number is unclear.
The text 'Interior-side yard' is sometimes hyphenated and sometimes not in the diagrams.
